name: Tears to Tiara

insert-disc.description: Insert the Tears to Tiara DVD

content:
files:
- patch: http://dakkodango.com/files/ttt_english_v1.1.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Leaf/Tears to Tiara/TtT English.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert the Tears to Tiara DVD
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
